Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class SqliteProvider

Lightweight provider implementation targeting SQLite databases. Provides SQL generation and initialization routines specific to SQLite's feature set.

Inheritance
object
DatabaseProvider
SqliteProvider

Parameters
Type Name Description
OptimizedSqlBuilder sb

Maximum number of rows to return.

IsAvailableAsync()

Determines if the SQLite provider can be used in the current environment by verifying that the required Microsoft.Data.Sqlite assembly is available and that the SQLite engine meets the minimum version requirement.

Declaration
public override Task<bool> IsAvailableAsync()
